episodes.title: The End's Beginning
episodes.description: Hostile townsfolk and a cunning mage greet Geralt in the town of Blaviken. Ciri finds her royal world upended when Nilfgaard sets its sights on Cintra.

episodes.title: Four Marks
episodes.description: Bullied and neglected, Yennefer accidentally finds a means of escape. Geralt's hunt for a so-called devil goes to hell. Ciri seeks safety in numbers.

episodes.title: Betrayer Moon
episodes.description: Geralt takes on another Witcher's unfinished business in a kingdom stalked by a ferocious beast. At a brutal cost, Yennefer forges a magical new future.

episodes.title: Of Banquets, Bastards and Burials
episodes.description: Against his better judgment, Geralt accompanies Jaskier to a royal ball. Ciri wanders into an enchanted forest. Yennefer tries to protect her charges.

episodes.title: Bottled Appetites
episodes.description: Heedless of warnings, Yennefer looks for a cure to restore what she's lost. Geralt inadvertently puts Jaskier in peril. The search for Ciri intensifies.

episodes.title: Rare Species
episodes.description: A mysterious man tries to entice Geralt to join a hunt for a rampaging dragon, a quest that attracts a familiar face. Ciri questions who she can trust.

episodes.title: Before a Fall
episodes.description: With the Continent at risk from Nilfgaard's rising power, Yennefer revisits her past, while Geralt reconsiders his obligation to the Law of Surprise.

episodes.title: Much More
episodes.description: A terrifying pack of foes lays Geralt low. Yennefer and her fellow mages prepare to fight back. A shaken Ciri depends on the kindness of a stranger.

episodes.title: A Grain of Truth
episodes.description: Geralt sets off with Ciri on a journey that leads him to an old friend. After the battle of Sodden, Tissaia shows no mercy in her search of information.

episodes.title: Kaer Morhen
episodes.description: Seeking a safe place for Ciri, Geralt heads for home, but danger lurks everywhere - even Kaer Morhen. Yennefer's dreams could be the key to her freedom.

episodes.title: What Is Lost
episodes.description: Impatient with Geralt's methods, Ciri braves major obstacles to prove her mettle. Scheming and suspicion among the Brotherhood make Yennifer a target.

episodes.title: Redanian Intelligence
episodes.description: A guest at Kaer Morhen extends a guiding hand to Ciri - and an invitation to Geralt. On the run in Redania, Yennifer seeks safety below ground.

episodes.title: Turn Your Back
episodes.description: As a powerful mage joins the hunt for Ciri, she cuts a deal with Vesemir over his extraordinary discovery. Geralt explores the mystery of the monoliths.

episodes.title: Dear Friend...
episodes.description: A close friend is lost - and another found - as Geralt helps Ciri learn more about her power. Cahir warns Fringilla to focus on their primary mission.

episodes.title: Voleth Meir
episodes.description: Geralt turns to a humble bard for help, Yennifer realizes just how special Ciri is, and tensions rise on the eve of Emperor Emhyr's visit to Cintra.

episodes.title: Family
episodes.description: Geralt faces off with a demon targeting his nearest and dearest while the most powerful players on the continent ramp up their pursuit of Ciri.
